There are a few ways you might be able to get a free or discounted YMCA pass:

1. Check with your local YMCA to see if they offer any free trial passes. Many YMCAs offer a free or discounted pass for first-time visitors, or for people who are considering joining the YMCA.
2. Look for special promotions or discounts. The YMCA sometimes offers discounts to certain groups of people, such as military personnel, first responders, or low-income individuals. You can check the YMCA's website or contact your local YMCA to see if they have any current promotions or discounts available.
3. Consider applying for financial assistance. The YMCA offers financial assistance to help people who cannot afford the full cost of a membership. You can apply for financial assistance by contacting your local YMCA and providing information about your income and financial situation.
4. Check with your employer or health insurance provider. Some employers and health insurance providers offer discounts or reimbursements for YMCA memberships. You can check with your employer or health insurance provider to see if they have any programs or benefits that can help you save money
